body: The following is the building geometries read from and IDF file through the OpenStudio plugin for Sketchup: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lImtC*n*NfLpcRI1ZMbYZYbSAlrzNSLJEBU3F5TyeRkud4z83x4GkpurQKk74uyHjAr4V7BRp3wUkh*zNpBP-quPjLOSSj*p/Image8.png) However, the geometries produced by the Honeybee import IDF component seem to be scrambled. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lImtC*n*NfIcxHtmMvAeDUxTy3JqYed-ZyCcWCFGikyRccZGhfNuF89ZpXgyzhoY4QbnpaR7LpaYybYVzKtr9NMTqi2S4Zp0/Image9.png) May I ask if this component can only read IDF file created by EnergyPlus 8 or later? (The test IDF file is created in E+ v7) Thanks!
topic: HB zones read from IDF file are scrambled.

replies.body:
Ji,

It looks like an issue about global vs local vertices. I'm sure that I tried to implement it to import Idf but it is failing in your case. Is it possible for you to share the file with me?

Mostapha

Thank you, Mostapha. Apologize for my late reply.



I'll send you the IDF file through another email later.
